summary: Create a high-level client for Ruby SDK to manage worker deployments and control plane operations, following patterns established in the Go SDK implementation.
userImpact: Ruby SDK users need a high-level client API to manage worker deployments and versioning, currently unavailable in the Ruby implementation.
proposedFix: Implement worker versioning high-level client for Ruby SDK, modeling it after the Go SDK implementation.
keyQuote: Create the high-level client for control plane operations concerning worker deployments. See the Go one as an example
